meanings.definition: A device for measuring work or muscular activity.
meanings.sent1: The ergograph displayed how much work my muscles did during the exercise.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used the ergograph to measure the muscular activity of the participants.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the ergograph for a regular scale and tried to weigh my muscles.
meanings.sent4: The ergograph was like a detective, uncovering the secrets of muscle work.
meanings.sent5: The ergograph hummed softly as it recorded the muscle activity, like a diligent assistant.

meanings.definition: To measure work or muscular activity using an ergograph.
meanings.sent1: She will ergograph the participants to analyze their muscle activity.
meanings.sent2: The researchers ergograph every week to track the progress of the study.
meanings.sent3: He ergographs with such precision that it almost seems like a form of art.
meanings.sent4: Ergographing the data revealed interesting patterns in muscle activity.
meanings.sent5: The coach ergographs diligently, ensuring accurate measurements for each athlete.
